docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is stable and recommended for use. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or using api/v2/ in the URL.

methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
GET /api/puppetclasses/298486374/smart_class_parameters/1018350795-custom_class_param
200
{
  "parameter": "custom_class_param",
  "id": 1018350795,
  "description": null,
  "override": true,
  "parameter_type": "string",
  "default_value": "abcdef",
  "required": false,
  "validator_type": null,
  "validator_rule": null,
  "override_value_order": "organization,location",
  "override_values_count": 0,
  "created_at": "2014-09-02T14:00:17Z",
  "updated_at": "2014-09-02T14:00:17Z",
  "override_values": [],
  "environments": [
    {
      "id": 334344675,
      "name": "production"
    }
  ]
}
